scripts.wasm:build:signer: bash -lc 'command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 || cargo install wasm-pack --locked; cd ../wasm/session-signer && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir ../../site/src/lib/wasm/session-signer'
scripts.wasm:rebuild:signer: npm run wasm:clean:signer && npm run wasm:build:signer
scripts.dev:kill: bash -lc 'pkill -f "astro dev" || true; lsof -t -i:4321 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.cf:tunnel:named: wait-on -t 300000 http://127.0.0.1:4321 && cloudflared tunnel --config cloudflared/config.yml run ariane-dev
scripts.cf:tunnel:bg: wait-on -t 300000 http://127.0.0.1:4321 && nohup cloudflared tunnel --config $(pwd)/cloudflared/config.yml run ariane-dev > $HOME/.cloudflared/ariane-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > $HOME/.cloudflared/ariane-dev.pid && for i in {1..20}; do [ -f $HOME/.cloudflared/ariane-dev.log ] && break || sleep 0.25; done; tail -n 20 $HOME/.cloudflared/ariane-dev.log
scripts.dev:bg: nohup bash -lc 'CF_TUNNEL_HOST=tunnel.wenzelarifiandi.com astro dev --host 127.0.0.1 --port 4321' > $HOME/.cloudflared/astro-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > $HOME/.cloudflared/astro-dev.pid && sleep 1 && tail -n 20 $HOME/.cloudflared/astro-dev.log
